name: Rio
headline: Mexicoâ s largest digital asset brokerage
description: Rio is the premier stablecoin liquidity provider for the LATAM market. We enable access to stablecoins for financial innovators to scale their products.

founders.name: Eudelio Garza, Founder
founders.description: Eudelio is the CEO of Rio. Prior to Rio, he was a Product Manager at BlockVigil, a dev platform that provides Matic nodes as a service. He onboarded 30 developers and helped the company reach 1 billion API calls/day. When talking to web3 devs, he realized the need for better on-and-off ramping infrastructure in emerging markets.

founders.name: Ricardo Villarreal Chapa, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Rio (YC S22). Studied Computer Engineering at Boston University. Ex engineering product manager (for banks) and private equity analyst. Enjoys training BJJ, rockclimbing, and tennis.

# Stablecoins for LATAM
Powering stablecoin adoption with tailored liquidity solutions. Trade virtual assets at Internet speed.
[Schedule Demo](https://www.rio.trade/<https:/calendly.com/bookrio/30-min-meeting-1>)
## Working With Top Industry Players
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b59d/66da05127ad6dbb9d5225739_Bitstamp%20Logo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b59d/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b5f1_Logo%2002.svg)

INNOVATIVE FINANCE
## Changing the Course of Finance Through Stablecoins
With compliance controls that go above and beyond the requirements of regulators, tight FX spreads, and instant settlements, Rio is bringing stablecoins to the forefront of finance.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b59d/66c6da1c964424ba9f01b656_Homepage%20-%20IMG%2001%403x%20-%20OPT.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b59d/66c6da1c964424ba9f01b656_Homepage%20-%20IMG%2001%403x%20-%20OPT.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b59d/66c6da1c964424ba9f01b65f_Frame%2015.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b59d/66c6da1c964424ba9f01b65f_Frame%2015.svg)
BUSINESS
## Our Stablecoin Solutions for Business
### [Liquidity ProvisionPlug in Rio's Liquidity Provisioning & Market Making services to access tight spreads between local currencies and stablecoins.Learn More](https://www.rio.trade/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)### [Stablecoin FXConvert fiat to stablecoins to fiat, in seconds, on-chain, with lower fees than traditional FX.Learn More](https://www.rio.trade/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)### [OTCExperience institutional-grade stablecoin trading with our OTC desk. Enjoy ultra-tight spreads, 24/7 market access, and a dedicated relationship manager.Learn More](https://www.rio.trade/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b59d/66c6da1c964424ba9f01b658_Homepage%2002%20-%20IMG%403x%20-%20OPT.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b59d/66c6da1c964424ba9f01b643_Home%20-%20Img%2004.webp)
## Our Numbers Speak Louder Than Words
Building the leading stablecoin platform for Latin America, with speed and intention. LATAM's most powerful stablecoin infrastructure, by the numbers.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b59d/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b5d3_Institutional%20Clients.svg)
40+
No. of Institutional Clients
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b59d/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b5d4_Local%20Currencies.svg)
8+
No. of Local Currencies
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b59d/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b5e6_Annual%20Volume.svg)
$1Bn USD+
No. of Annual Volume
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b59d/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b5d2_Stablecoins.svg)
5+
No. of Stablecoins
PRINCIPLES
## Rio’s Guiding Principles
Building Stablecoin Finance
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b59d/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b5e9_Robust%20Compliance.svg)
### Robust Compliance
At Rio, compliance is our #1 priority. Our AML policies go above and beyond regulatory requirements because we know how important security and trust is when it comes to handling your money.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b59d/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b5e8_Tight%20FX%20Spreads.svg)
### Tight FX Spreads
We are focused on offering the tightest stablecoin/fiat spreads in the market. Whether it's through our fine-tuned algorithms or robust banking structure, our focus is on increasing your margins.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b59d/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b5e7_Painless%20Integration.svg)
### Painless Integration
We designed our APIs and documentation to be powerful yet accessible. Developers can build custom experiences, knowing that Rio’s access points are stable and secure.
## Impact & Reach across the LATAM region
Based in Mexico City and delivering excellence all over LATAM.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b59d/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b60b_Wordl%20Map%204.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b59d/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b60d_Big%20Dot.svg)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b59d/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b60c_Small%20Dot.svg)
‍Bogota, Colombia
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b59d/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b60c_Small%20Dot.svg)
‍Lima, Peru
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b59d/66c6da1b964424ba9f01b60c_Small%20Dot.svg)

generated_description:
### Company Summary: Rio

**Overview**  
Rio is becoming a key player in the financial technology scene in Latin America. Founded in 2022 and based in Mexico City, Rio aims to be Mexico’s largest digital asset brokerage, focusing primarily on stablecoin liquidity for the region. The company was part of Y Combinator’s Summer 2022 batch, which is a testament to its potential.

**Mission**  
The core mission of Rio is to enable access to stablecoins for financial innovators looking to scale their products. This is crucial in a region where traditional banking can be restrictive. By positioning itself as the premier stablecoin liquidity provider for Latin America, Rio is opening up avenues for trading virtual assets at incredible speeds.

**Team and Leadership**  
Rio has a team of ten dedicated professionals. Dalton Caldwell serves as the Group Partner, guiding the company towards achieving its ambitious goals.

**Key Services**  
Rio specializes in three main areas:

1. **Liquidity Provisioning:** Providing market makers and clients access to tight spreads between local currencies and stablecoins.
2. **Stablecoin FX:** Enabling quick and cost-effective conversions between fiat and stablecoins, significantly reducing fees compared to traditional foreign exchange methods.
3. **OTC (Over-the-Counter) Trading:** Offering institutional-grade stablecoin trading with ultra-tight spreads and dedicated support.

**Impact and Reach**  
In only a short time, Rio has achieved considerable milestones, supporting over 40 institutional clients and facilitating transactions across more than 8 local currencies, with an astonishing annual transaction volume exceeding $1 billion. They currently work with five different stablecoins, illustrating their robust infrastructure and commitment to diverse financial solutions.

**Principles and Compliance**  
Rio prioritizes robust compliance with strict regulatory standards, ensuring trust and security in handling clients’ assets. By employing fine-tuned algorithms to maintain tight FX spreads, the company ensures that its clients maximize their trading potential. Furthermore, the integration of Rio's APIs is designed to be seamless for developers, promoting customized and secure financial solutions.

**Vision for the Future**  
Through strategic partnerships and an innovative approach to stablecoin finance, Rio is not just trying to change the way transactions happen in Latin America; it is striving to establish a new financial ecosystem where stability and accessibility reign.

**Contact**  
For more information or to engage with Rio, visit [their website](https://www.rio.trade).

---

Rio's journey is a powerful reminder that in the rapidly evolving landscape of digital finance, those who prioritize innovation and compliance will lead the way. They’re not just participating in the fintech revolution; they’re helping to shape its future in Latin America.
